meanings.sent1: The brave knight vanquishes the dragon with his sword.
meanings.sent2: The soccer team vanquishes their opponents in the championship game.
meanings.sent3: The clever detective vanquishes the mystery with his keen observation skills.
meanings.sent4: The sun vanquishes the darkness as it rises in the morning sky.
meanings.sent5: The superhero vanquishes evil with her extraordinary powers.

meanings.definition: Conquer or subdue by superior force.
meanings.sent1: The army vanquishes the enemy in battle.
meanings.sent2: The powerful king vanquishes neighboring kingdoms to expand his empire.
meanings.sent3: The chef vanquishes the competition with his delicious recipes.
meanings.sent4: The storm vanquishes the fragile sandcastle on the beach.
meanings.sent5: The champion boxer vanquishes his opponent with a knockout punch.
